Player History
Drafted in 6th round, 152nd overall pick, by Cleveland in 2015...
Traded from Cleveland to St. Louis on 7/7/2016 (Going to STL: RF T. Harrison, SS H. Prioleau, P A. Leak, P B. Kim. Going to CLE: P J. Santana, 1B M. Napoli)...
Injured on 8/1/2017 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Had first career hit on 4/3/2019, off JR Graham (HOU)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/5/2019, off Augustine Roush (CIN)...
Drove in 6 runs against Pittsburgh on 4/17/2020...
Injured on 8/26/2022 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 9/13/2023...
Won Gold Glove Award at Shortstop in 2023...
